body.name: origin & horizons, Conversation Starter Collection, Stainless Steel Water Bottle, Insulated, Double Wall, Vacuum Flask, 17 oz (Set 1 - torture, pest, beast, nihilism, dismembered, Black)
features: Ergonomic Bowling Pin Design - Enjoy our 17 oz (500 ml) stainless steel water bottle, boasting a distinctive bowling pin shape measuring 10.5″ × 2.85″ (27 × 7 cm), offering a unique and comfortable grip.
Temperature Retention Innovation - Experience the vacuum flask and double-wall construction, ensuring your beverages stay hot or cold for up to 6 hours, suitable for various climates.
Sleek Glossy Finish - Admire the bottle's stylish appearance with a glossy finish, adding a touch of sophistication to your hydration routine.
Secure and Odorless Seal - Utilize the odorless and leak-proof cap, guaranteeing a secure closure to prevent spills and maintain the freshness of your drink.
Versatile Use for Hot and Cold - Benefit from its insulation, making it suitable for both hot and cold liquids, allowing you to enjoy your preferred temperature anytime, anywhere.
Care and Hygiene Conscious - Maintain product longevity and hygiene with hand-wash instructions, ensuring proper care for continued usage.
Designed in collaboration with Art thou Inketh (IG @art.thou.inketh).

Characters Reflecting Societal Struggles - Encounter the characters from "Design Set 1"—Torture, Pest, Beast, Nihilism, Dismembered; and "Design Set 2"—Accident, Ageing, Voyage, Supernatural, Cannibal—etched on these mugs, serving as symbols to initiate contemplation on various societal challenges.
Hygienic Usage Reminder - We advise against keeping water in the bottle for over 24 hours due to hygienic concerns and potential unpleasant odors.
body.description: Life's path often winds through complex terrain—some parts vibrant and captivating, others clouded with challenges that linger in the shadows. If you're navigating these societal struggles or standing beside someone who is, let this mug serve as a beacon of empathy, a silent ally in times of uncertainty. Crafted with care, this Conversation Starter Mug isn't just about its sturdy build or its array of colors—it's a canvas, a canvas for awareness, for societal dialogue, for advocating change. As you cradle this mug in your hands, feel its warmth not just from the beverage it holds but from the promise it embodies. The characters portrayed—symbols of societal turmoil—may seem stark, yet they represent battles fought, resilience shown, and a journey toward societal healing. Our intention isn't to evoke despair but to shed light on conversations often whispered in the margins. For those impacted by these issues, this mug symbolizes a glimmer of hope—a reminder that amidst the chaos, there's space for progress. With each sip, let it signify solidarity, resilience, and the promise of a more inclusive tomorrow. To the allies, the advocates, the supporters: your presence, your advocacy, and your unwavering support are catalysts for change. This mug signifies unity, a token of gratitude for being a voice of reason and empathy in a world striving for equity. As you share a drink, let it signify the power of unity, understanding, and the beauty of collective action. Remember, this mug carries more than just coffee or tea. It embodies stories, amplifies voices, and stands as a symbol of resilience against societal challenges. It’s a reminder that together, we can strive for progress, justice, and a better world for all. With warmth and solidarity, origin & horizons
